{"id":958702651,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1685242695,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/958702651/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Difference of Number of Distinct Values on Diagonals","memory":"45 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[][] differenceOfDistinctValues(int[][] grid) {\n        \n         int n = grid[0].length;\n        int m = grid.length;\n          int[][] anshe = new int[m][n];\n        for(int i = 0; i<m; i++){\n            for(int j = 0; j<n; j++){\n                int newii = i+1;\n                int newjj= j+1;\n                 HashSet<Integer> hso = new HashSet<>();\n                while(newii<m && newjj< n){\n                    hso.add(grid[newii][newjj]);\n                    newii++;\n                    newjj++;\n                }\n                anshe[i][j] = hso.size();\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i = m-1; i>=0; i--){\n            for(int j = n-1; j>=0; j--){\n                int newii = i-1;\n                int newjj= j-1;\n                HashSet<Integer> hsoo = new HashSet<>();\n                while(newii>=0 && newjj>=0){\n                    hsoo.add(grid[newii][newjj]);\n                    newii--;\n                    newjj--;\n                }\n                anshe[i][j] = Math.abs(anshe[i][j] - hsoo.size());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return anshe;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"difference-of-number-of-distinct-values-on-diagonals","has_notes":false}
